title: What time is Riverdale episode one released on Netflix?
text:
Riverdale is going back to its roots for its fourth season on Netflix (Picture: The CW)

With Riverdale season four about to bring more high-camp, film noir-inspired drama to Netflix, KJ Apa, who plays lead character Archie Andrews, has been speaking of his excitement at the new episodes.

Hot on the heels of its US premiere, Riverdale will return to our screens in the UK for a season that Apa says will hark back to some of the original themes of the show.

Series three ended with Archie, Betty Cooper (Lili Reinhart), Jughead Jones (Cole Sprouse) and Veronica Lodge (Camila Mendes) looking ahead to senior year.

Want to know when you can catch the show and what to expect? Here’s everything you need to know…

What time is Riverdale episode one released on Netflix in the UK?

Riverdale is released on Thursday, October 10 in the UK, with the first episode available from around 8am.

How many episodes of Riverdale series four are there?

As was the case for the previous two seasons, fans have 22 episodes to look forward to this time around.

There have been 57 episodes of the hit series so far.

What will happen in Riverdale series four?

The opening episodes of series four are likely to provide closure around the character of Fred Andrews, who was played by Luke Perry until the actor’s death earlier this year.

Apa has also expanded upon some of the storylines coming up in the unpredictable drama over the next few months.

The 27-year-old New Zealand actor said at Comic-Con: ‘I’m personally excited about us going back to the theme of season one this time. It’s gonna be pretty nice to be able to work with each other a lot more, spend a lot more time in high school and embrace those high school things that some of us didn’t really get to experience in our own lives.

‘I didn’t get to attend my last year of high school for senior year. I’m really excited to go to things like prom, play some football, hang out with my mates and just be a teenager. There’s going to be a lot of football, which is fun.’

Riverdale season 4 is on Netflix in the UK from 8am on Thursday, October 10.
